name: application-PendingAcceptance
subject: Your Vendor registration for [[event.display_name]]
body:
Greetings,

Thank you for applying for **[[event.display_name]]**.

We are extremely sorry, but due to the limited number of space we have in our vendor hall, and the large number of applications we have received, your [[badge_type_name]] application for **[[display_name]]** has been denied. 

Thank you for applying this year, and we hope to see you apply next year!


Thanks,
[[event.display_name]] Registration
